verses.text: Great \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord \w and|strong="H1121"\w* greatly \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* praised, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* town \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our God, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7141"\w* holy mountain.

Beautiful \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w its|strong="H5892"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* position, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* joy \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Zion, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* King.
\w In|strong="H0776"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* buildings God \w is|strong="H0776"\w* seen \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* high tower.
\w For|strong="H3045"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w*! \w the|strong="H3045"\w* kings came together \w by|strong="H0430"\w* agreement, \w they|strong="H0430"\w* \w were|strong="H0430"\w* joined together.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* full \w of|strong="H4428"\w* wonder; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* troubled, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* went quickly \w away|strong="H5674"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* fear.

Shaking came \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* pain, \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* woman \w in|strong="H7200"\w* childbirth.

\w By|strong="H3205"\w* \w you|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* ships \w of|strong="H3205"\w* Tarshish \w are|strong="H8033"\w* broken \w as|strong="H8033"\w* \w by|strong="H3205"\w* \w an|strong="H8033"\w* east wind.

As \w it|strong="H7665"\w* \w came|strong="H7307"\w* \w to|strong="H7307"\w* our ears so have we seen \w it|strong="H7665"\w*, \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* town \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H7307"\w* armies, \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* town \w of|strong="H7307"\w* our God; God \w will|strong="H7307"\w* keep \w it|strong="H7665"\w* fixed for ever. (Selah.)

\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* thoughts \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w while|strong="H5704"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* Temple.

\w As|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* name \w is|strong="H0430"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, so \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* praise \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* earth; \w your|strong="H7130"\w* right hand \w is|strong="H0430"\w* full \w of|strong="H0430"\w* righteousness.

\w Let|strong="H3651"\w* there \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Judah \w be|strong="H8034"\w* glad, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wise decisions.
\w Make|strong="H8055"\w* your \w way|strong="H4941"\w* \w about|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* go round \w it|strong="H8055"\w*, numbering its towers.

Take note \w of|strong="H4026"\w* its strong walls, looking well at its fair buildings; \w so|strong="H5608"\w* that \w you|strong="H6726"\w* may give word \w of|strong="H4026"\w* \w it|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* generation which comes after.

\w Because|strong="H4616"\w* \w this|strong="H4616"\w* God \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w our|strong="H7896"\w* God \w for|strong="H4616"\w* ever \w and|strong="H3820"\w* ever: \w he|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w our|strong="H7896"\w* guide.
